answers.answer: Oh I forgot to add I have type 2 diabetes untreated.

This sounds a little like Retrograde Ejaculation.  The difference is that you are describing urine in semen while ejaculating rather than semen in urine while urinating.  Have you looked into this as a possiblity?http://diabetes.niddk.nih.gov/dm/pubs/sup/index.htmI am not sure what else it could be, but I would suggest seeing a doctor, especially if it does not clear up quickly.  I did find another reference where someone asked a similar question that I thought you might find interesting:http://www.medhelp.org/forums/urology/archive/976.html
Hey bro.I think i have also got this problem.Please suggest me have u done with your problem and what did u do?

question: I'm 20 years 6ft 245 lb , I'm having urine present when I ejaculate. I know its urine from the smell. I've been having this for 3 days straight. There seems to be some jello-ish clumps aswell. I have no pain before, during, and after masturbating. Now the first day this happened, I masturbatedwhen I felt I needed to urinate. That was on a full bladder. When I ejaculated urine came out. I'm wondering if I messed something up. Is this a serious problem?
title: Urine in semen
